name: CUSTOM Delivery timer
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
>

{%- liquid
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign delivery_position = section.settings.delivery_position

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile
  assign heading_use_delivery = section.settings.heading_use_delivery

  assign items_style = section.settings.items_style
  assign items_mt = section.settings.items_mt
  assign items_gap = section.settings.items_gap

  assign item_padding_vertical = section.settings.item_padding_vertical
  assign item_padding_horizontal = section.settings.item_padding_horizontal
  assign item_radius = section.settings.item_radius
  assign item_border_thickness = section.settings.item_border_thickness
  assign item_border_color = section.settings.item_border_color
  assign item_arrow = section.settings.item_arrow

  assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile
  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size
  assign icon_bg_color = section.settings.icon_bg_color
  assign icon_color = section.settings.icon_color

  assign line_color = section.settings.line_color

  assign date_size = section.settings.date_size
  assign date_size_mobile = section.settings.date_size_mobile
  assign date_color = section.settings.date_color
  assign date_custom = section.settings.date_custom
  assign date_font = section.settings.date_font
  assign date_height = section.settings.date_height
  assign date_mt = section.settings.date_mt

  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  date_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }

  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .delivery-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .delivery-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .delivery-top-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ items_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }

  .delivery-second-body-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ items_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }

  .delivery-top-item-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 0 0 {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }} {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    background-color: {{ icon_bg_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 7px;
  }

  .delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ icon_color }};
  }

  .delivery-top-line-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: {{ line_color }};
  }

  .delivery-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat({{ section.blocks.size}}, 1fr);
    gap: {{ items_gap }}px;
  }

  .delivery-item-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .delivery-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
    text-align: left;
  }

  .delivery-item-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
    text-align: right;
  }

  .delivery-date-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    padding-top: {{ date_mt }}px;
    font-size: {{ date_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ date_color }};
    line-height: {{ date_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .delivery-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: {{ item_padding_vertical | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    border: {{ item_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_border_color }};
    position: relative;
  }

  .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} .delivery-title-{{ section.id }},
  .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} .delivery-date-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: center;
  }

  .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} .delivery-title-{{ section.id }} {
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} .delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }

    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .delivery-top-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ items_mt }}px;
    }

    .delivery-second-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ items_mt }}px;
    }

    .delivery-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .delivery-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .delivery-top-item-{{ section.id }} {
      flex: 0 0 {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }

    .delivery-date-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ date_size }}px;
    }

    .delivery-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} .delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }

    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ item_padding_vertical }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

  }
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .delivery-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if date_custom %}
  <style>
    .delivery-date-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ date_font.family }}, {{ date_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ date_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ date_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .delivery-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if items_gap < 1 %}
  <style>
    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      border-left: 0px;
    }

    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
      border-top-left-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
      border-bottom-left-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    }

    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
      border-top-right-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
      border-bottom-right-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }} {
      border-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if item_arrow %}
  <style>
    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }}:after {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      right: -3px;
      top: 48%;
      width: 16px;
      height: 16px;
      transform: rotate(45deg) translateY(-50%);
      border-right: {{ item_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_border_color }};
      border-top: {{ item_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_border_color }};
      background-color: {{ background_color }};
      z-index: 2;
    }

    .delivery-second-item-{{ section.id }}:last-child:after {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<script>
  (function () {
    function moreLoadProductForm() {
      var productForm = document.querySelector('#custom-delivery');
      if (!productForm){
        var productForm = document.querySelector('{% if delivery_position == "below_title" or delivery_position == "above_title" %}.product__title{% elsif delivery_position == "below_description" %}.product__description{% else %}.button--add-to-cart, .product .product-form, .product-single__add-to-cart, .shopify-payment-button, .shopify-payment-button__button, .ProductForm__BuyButtons, .add-to-cart{% endif %}');
        if (!productForm) return;
        }
        const templateContent = document.querySelector(
          '#custom-delivery-{{ section.id }}'
        ).content;

        productForm.insertAdjacentElement(
          '{% if delivery_position == "below_buy" or delivery_position == "below_title" or delivery_position == "below_description" %}afterend{% else %}beforebegin{% endif %}',
          templateContent.firstElementChild
        );
    }

    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', moreLoadProductForm);
  })();
</script>

{% capture svg_example_1 %}
 <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" x="0px" y="0px"><title>lock-check-2</title><desc>Created with Sketch Beta.</desc><g stroke="none" stroke-width="1" fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" sketch:type="MSPage"><g sketch:type="MSArtboardGroup" fill="#000000"><path d="M30,42 L21.9803572,42 C17.5704912,42 14,45.586665 14,50.0110405 L14,85.9889595 C14,90.4258294 17.5729276,94 21.9803572,94 L78.0196428,94 C82.4295088,94 86,90.413335 86,85.9889595 L86,50.0110405 C86,45.5741706 82.4270724,42 78.0196428,42 L70,42 L70,25 C70,14.5042825 61.4914975,6 50.9957277,6 L49.0042723,6 C38.5074446,6 30,14.5065898 30,25 L30,42 L30,42 L30,42 Z M38,42 L62,42 L62,25.9973518 C62,19.363876 56.627417,14 50,14 C43.3860685,14 38,19.3713974 38,25.9973518 L38,42 L38,42 L38,42 Z M39.5824667,63.1606146 L34,68.8303073 L45.9824667,81 L50.1693167,76.7477305 L66,60.6696927 L60.4175333,55 L45.9824667,69.6606146 L39.5824667,63.1606146 L39.5824667,63.1606146 Z" sketch:type="MSShapeGroup"/></g></g></svg>
{% endcapture %}

  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  viewBox="0 0 50 50" width="50px" height="50px"><path d="M48.375 22.062L44.219 16.5C43.266 15.352 41.77 14 40 14h-7v25c.48 2.832 3.031 5 6 5s5.43-2.168 5.906-5H47c1.57 0 3-1.43 3-3v-9.625C50 24.363 48.551 22.309 48.375 22.062zM39 42c-2.207 0-4-1.793-4-4s1.793-4 4-4 4 1.793 4 4S41.207 42 39 42zM48 27H38c-1 0-2-1-2-2v-4c0-1.105 1-2 2-2h5.594l3.188 4.25C47.121 23.73 48 25.203 48 26.375V27zM28.188 7H2.844C1.273 7 0 8.277 0 9.844V17.5h12c.276 0 .5-.224.5-.5v-2.835l6.774 6.434L12.5 27.032V24c0-.276-.224-.5-.5-.5H0V36c0 1.566 1.43 3 3 3h4.094c.477 2.836 2.938 5 5.906 5s5.43-2.164 5.906-5h9.25C29.723 39 31 37.723 31 36.156V9.906C31 8.305 29.738 7 28.188 7zM13 42c-2.207 0-4-1.793-4-4s1.793-4 4-4 4 1.793 4 4S15.207 42 13 42z"/></svg>

  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  viewBox="0 0 50 50" width="50px" height="50px"><path d="M 25 1 C 16.179688 1 9 8.179688 9 17 C 9 31.113281 23.628906 47.945313 24.25 48.65625 C 24.441406 48.875 24.710938 49 25 49 C 25.308594 48.980469 25.558594 48.875 25.75 48.65625 C 26.371094 47.933594 41 30.8125 41 17 C 41 8.179688 33.820313 1 25 1 Z M 25 12 C 28.3125 12 31 14.6875 31 18 C 31 21.3125 28.3125 24 25 24 C 21.6875 24 19 21.3125 19 18 C 19 14.6875 21.6875 12 25 12 Z"/></svg>

<template id="custom-delivery-{{ section.id }}">
  <div
    class="section-{{ section.id }} delivery-{{ section.id }}"
    style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"
  >
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings" id="custom-delivery-body-{{ section.id }}">
      {% if heading != blank or heading_use_delivery %}
        <div class="delivery-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          <h2>
            {% if heading_use_delivery %}
              <span>
                {% for block in section.blocks %}
                  {% if forloop.last %}
                    {% assign days_to_add = block.settings.days | plus: 0 %}
                    {% assign days_to_add_in_seconds = days_to_add | times: 86400 %}
                    {% assign extra_days = 0 %}
                    {% assign current_date = 'now' | date: '%s' | plus: 0 %}
                    
                    {% assign current_wday = current_date | date: '%u' %}
                    {% if block.settings.weekend == false and current_wday == '6' or current_wday == '7' %}
                      {% assign current_date = current_date | plus: 86400 %}
                      {% if current_wday == '6' %}
                        {% assign current_date = current_date | plus: 86400 %}
                      {% endif %}
                    {% endif %}
                    
                    {% assign target_date_in_seconds = current_date | plus: days_to_add_in_seconds %}
                    {% for i in (0..days_to_add) %}
                      {% assign days = i | times: 86400 %}
                      {% assign day_in_seconds = current_date | plus: days %}
                      {% assign wday = day_in_seconds | date: '%u' %}
                      {% if block.settings.weekend == false and wday == '6' or wday == '7' %}
                        {% assign extra_days = extra_days | plus: 1 %}
                        {% if wday == '6' %}
                          {% assign extra_days = extra_days | plus: 1 %}
                        {% endif %}
                      {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}
                    
                    {% assign second_days_to_add = block.settings.second_days | plus: 0 %}
                    {% assign second_days_to_add_in_seconds = second_days_to_add | times: 86400 %}
                    {% assign second_extra_days = 0 %}
                    {% assign second_target_date_in_seconds = current_date | plus: second_days_to_add_in_seconds  %}
                    {% for i in (0..second_days_to_add) %}
                      {% assign second_days = i | times: 86400 %}
                      {% assign second_day_in_seconds = current_date | plus: second_days %}
                      {% assign second_wday = second_day_in_seconds | date: '%u' %}
                      {% if block.settings.weekend == false and second_wday == '6' or second_wday == '7' %}
                        {% assign second_extra_days = second_extra_days | plus: 1 %}
                        {% if second_wday == '6' %}
                          {% assign second_extra_days = second_extra_days | plus: 1 %}
                        {% endif %}
                      {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}
                  
                    {% if block.settings.weekend == false %}
                      {% assign extra_days_in_seconds = extra_days | times: 86400 %}
                      {% assign final_date_in_seconds = target_date_in_seconds | plus: extra_days_in_seconds %}
                      {% assign final_date = final_date_in_seconds | date: '%d %b' %}
                      {% assign second_extra_days_in_seconds = second_extra_days | times: 86400 %}
                      {% assign second_final_date_in_seconds = second_target_date_in_seconds | plus: second_extra_days_in_seconds %}
                      {% assign second_final_date = second_final_date_in_seconds | date: '%d %b' %}
                    {% else %}
                      {% assign final_date = target_date_in_seconds | date: '%d %b' %}
                      {% assign second_final_date = second_target_date_in_seconds | date: '%d %b' %}
                    {% endif %}
                  
                    {% if shop.locale == 'es' %}
                      {% assign final_date = final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Enero' | replace: 'Feb', 'Feb' | replace: 'Mar', 'Marzo' | replace: 'Apr', 'Abr' | replace: 'May', 'Mayo' | replace: 'Jun', 'Jun' | replace: 'Jul', 'Jul' | replace: 'Aug', 'Agosto' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sept' | replace: 'Oct', 'Oct' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Dic'  %}
                      {% assign second_final_date = second_final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Enero' | replace: 'Feb', 'Feb' | replace: 'Mar', 'Marzo' | replace: 'Apr', 'Abr' | replace: 'May', 'Mayo' | replace: 'Jun', 'Jun' | replace: 'Jul', 'Jul' | replace: 'Aug', 'Agosto' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sept' | replace: 'Oct', 'Oct' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Dic'  %}
                    {% elsif shop.locale == 'fr' %}
                      {% assign final_date = final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Janv' | replace: 'Feb', 'Févr' | replace: 'Mar', 'Mars' | replace: 'Apr', 'Avril' | replace: 'May', 'Mai' | replace: 'Jun', 'Juin' | replace: 'Jul', 'Juil' | replace: 'Aug', 'Août' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sept' | replace: 'Oct', 'Oct' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Déc'  %}
                      {% assign second_final_date = second_final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Janv' | replace: 'Feb', 'Févr' | replace: 'Mar', 'Mars' | replace: 'Apr', 'Avril' | replace: 'May', 'Mai' | replace: 'Jun', 'Juin' | replace: 'Jul', 'Juil' | replace: 'Aug', 'Août' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sept' | replace: 'Oct', 'Oct' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Déc'  %}
                    {% elsif shop.locale == "de" %}
                      {% assign final_date = final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Jan' | replace: 'Feb', 'Feb' | replace: 'Mar', 'März' | replace: 'Apr', 'Apr' | replace: 'May', 'Mai' | replace: 'Jun', 'Juni' | replace: 'Jul', 'Juli' | replace: 'Aug', 'Aug' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sept' | replace: 'Oct', 'Okt' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Dez'  %}
                      {% assign second_final_date = second_final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Jan' | replace: 'Feb', 'Feb' | replace: 'Mar', 'März' | replace: 'Apr', 'Apr' | replace: 'May', 'Mai' | replace: 'Jun', 'Juni' | replace: 'Jul', 'Juli' | replace: 'Aug', 'Aug' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sept' | replace: 'Oct', 'Okt' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Dez'  %}
                    {% elsif shop.locale == "it" %}
                      {% assign final_date = final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Genn' | replace: 'Feb', 'Febbr' | replace: 'Mar', 'Mar' | replace: 'Apr', 'Apr' | replace: 'May', 'Magg' | replace: 'Jun', 'Giugno' | replace: 'Jul', 'Luglio' | replace: 'Aug', 'Ag' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sett' | replace: 'Oct', 'Ott' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Dic'  %}
                      {% assign second_final_date = second_final_date | replace: 'Jan', 'Genn' | replace: 'Feb', 'Febbr' | replace: 'Mar', 'Mar' | replace: 'Apr', 'Apr' | replace: 'May', 'Magg' | replace: 'Jun', 'Giugno' | replace: 'Jul', 'Luglio' | replace: 'Aug', 'Ag' | replace: 'Sep', 'Sett' | replace: 'Oct', 'Ott' | replace: 'Nov', 'Nov' | replace: 'Dec', 'Dic'  %}
                    {% endif %}  

                    {{ final_date }}
                    {% if block.settings.range %} - {{ second_final_date }} {% endif %}
                  {% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
              </span>
            {% endif %}
            {{ heading }}
          </h2>
        </div>
      {% endif %}

      {% if items_style == 'first' %}
        <div class="delivery-top-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% unless forloop.first %}
              <div class="delivery-top-line-{{ section.id }}"></div>
            {% endunless %}
            <div class="delivery-top-item-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="delivery-top-image-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  <img
                    src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}"
                    alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}"
                    {% if lazy %}
                      loading="lazy"
                    {% endif %}
                  >
                {% else %}
                  {% case forloop.index %}
                    {% when 1 %}
                      {{ svg_example_1 }}
                    {% when 2 %}
                      {{ svg_example_2 }}
                    {% when 3 %}
                      {{ svg_example_3 }}
                    {% else %}
                      {{ svg_example_1 }}
                  {% endcase %}
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>

        <div class="delivery-body-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <div class="delivery-item-{{ section.id }}">
              {% assign days_to_add = block.settings.days | plus: 0 %}
              {% assign days_to_add_in_seconds = days_to_add | times: 86400 %}
              {% assign extra_days = 0 %}
              {% assign current_date = 'now' | date: '%s' | plus: 0 %}
              
              {% assign current_wday = current_date | date: '%u' %}
              {% if block.settings.weekend == false and current_wday == '6' or current_wday == '7' %}
                {% assign current_date = current_date | plus: 86400 %}
                {% if current_wday == '6' %}
                  {% assign current_date = current_date | plus: 86400 %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endif %}
              
              {% assign target_date_in_seconds = current_date | plus: days_to_add_in_seconds %}
              {% for i in (0..days_to_add) %}
                {% assign days = i | times: 86400 %}
                {% assign day_in_seconds = current_date | plus: days %}
                {% assign wday = day_in_seconds | date: '%u' %}
                {% if block.settings.weekend == false and wday == '6' or wday == '7' %}
